name: Ratontuija
description:
In Ratontuija you are a mouse that has to catch rings and look for apples .

Original Mode = Catch rings ( 50 , 75 , 100) depending on the difficulty . 5 minutes

Search Mode = Eat Apple ( 1 , 2 , 3) depending on the difficulty . 

!! objects change places randomly in each game . 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 En Ratontuija sos un ratón que tiene que coger aros y buscar manzanas .

Modo Original = Coger aros (50,75,100) segun la dificultad . 5 minutos
Modo Busqueda = Comer Manzana (1 , 2 , 3) segun la dicultad . 

los objetos cambian de lugar en cada partida .
